title: Bundled Party Balloons
summaries: Bundled Party Balloons are a vanity accessory purchased from the Clothier for 2 GC while a Party is active. When worn, the balloons will be shown being held by the player, bobbing up and down.
The Bundled Party Balloons cannot be reforged, and therefore cannot have <linked>modifiers</linked>.

statistics.Buy: 2 GC
statistics.Sell: 40 SC
